data.name: txtAboutHonourableMentions
data.value: This work would not have been possible without the support of Sadik al'Dudei, Moran Lichtpfeil, Meschok, Sohn des Ssok, Ahgans Guelden (R.I.P), Alassar von Tundrien, Anjin Siebenstich, Sina ibn Rushd, Junis Djelef ibn Yakuban, Torfin Hardsgersen & Asleif Phileasson Foggwulf.

data.name: txtAboutLimitations
data.value: The app is an ongoing project and I doubt it'll ever be finished. But it serves us well. I hope it can do the same for you.

data.name: txtAboutMention1
data.value: makers of the Game Icons Bibliothek

data.name: txtAboutMoreMentions
data.value: We would also like to thank the {0}, the {1} including {2}, the {3} on this page, all the heroes of {4} and the guys of {5}.

data.name: txtAboutVersion
data.value: Fate Explorer has been created by {0}. This is release {1} code named {2} (build {3}).

data.name: txtAboutWhatis
data.value: The Fate Explorer helps you play the Dark Eye* table top games (rule system 5). Using it you can roll your dice easier. The Fate Explorer takes care of most of the core rules and can be described as an intelligent character sheet. Consecutive checks are done automatically and checked.

data.name: txtModifierTip
data.value: Use the modifier to factor (dis-) advantages in, any treat wounds boni or potions

data.name: txtRegisteredTrademark
data.value: The Dark Eye is a registered trade mark of the Ulisses Spiele GmbH.

data.name: msgDayOutOfRange
data.value: The set days of month do not work with the chosen month

data.name: txtDropHeightGallopTip
data.value: Fall from a galloping horse counts as fall from 3 yards.

data.name: txtDropHeightHorseTip
data.value: Fall from a horse counts as fall from 2 yards.

data.name: txtDropHeightTip
data.value: Drop height causes 1d6 damage per yard.

data.name: txtGround
data.value: The ground may harden or soften the fall.

data.name: txtJump
data.value: Damage from falling can be reduced with a Body Control (Jumping) check.
